targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'tasmotalab_energy_power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'tasmota_energy_power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'tasmota_energy_power_2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
